[Page Title: Home - Bushido Japanese Restaurant]

Start Your Order View Charleston Menu 
Grid Photo Gallery

Tell us about your experience!

★★★★★

Bushido is an awesome spot, super fresh sushi every time. The service is always on point. It’s a nice little date spot, nice casual relaxed environment . Definitely go if you're craving sushi.
Bryan M. 
★★★★★

We stopped in here on a spontaneous date night, and it turned out to be an excellent choice. The atmosphere was calm and relaxing, and the other guests were friendly and pleasant to be around. Our waitress was phenomenal—super attentive and informative. I’m not in this area often, but if I am and craving sushi or hibachi, you can bet I’ll be stopping by again. And be careful ordering the large carafe of sake. It's delicious and can sneak up on you.
PJ F. 
★★★★★

Literal bust sushi in Charleston. Kamikaze and sumo roll so good. We eat here twice a week I swear. My husband and daughter love the filet hibachi.
Jessica O.
